title: Arrive AI to Hold Inaugural Quarterly Results Call
description: INDIANAPOLIS, IN / ACCESS Newswire / August 7, 2025 / Arrive AI (NASDAQ:ARAI), an autonomous delivery network anchored by patented AI-powered Arrive Points™, will report its second quarter fiscal results on Thursday, August 14, 2025, after the market’s close. Following the issuance of the earnings release, the company will host a conference call and webcast […]
content:
INDIANAPOLIS, IN / ACCESS Newswire / August 7, 2025 / (NASDAQ:ARAI), an autonomous delivery network anchored by patented AI-powered Arrive Points™, will report its second quarter fiscal results on Thursday, August 14, 2025, after the market’s close.

Following the issuance of the earnings release, the company will host a conference call and webcast at 4:30 PM Eastern Time to review its results and strategic progress.

Company executives participating in the call will be CEO, Chairman and Founder Dan O’Toole, Chief Operating Officer Mark Hamm, Chief Strategy Officer Neerav Shah, Chief Financial Officer Todd Pepmeier and Corporate Counsel John Ritchison. Management will review quarterly accomplishments and address future strategic and operational objectives.

Join the webcast live via this link:

Or, if you are an analyst who would like to join the call and ask questions, contact Alliance IR at or call at 463-270-0092 and ask for CFO Todd Pepmeier.

A replay of the call will be accessible on .

delivery to and from a smart, AI-powered mailbox, whether by drone, ground robot or human courier. The platform provides real-time tracking, smart logistics alerts and advanced chain of custody controls to support shippers, delivery services and autonomous networks. By combining artificial intelligence with autonomous technology, Arrive AI makes the exchange of goods between people, robots and drones frictionless and convenient. Its system integrates with smart home devices such as doorbells, lighting and security systems to streamline the entire last-mile delivery experience. Learn more at and via the company’s .

This news release and statements of Arrive AI’s management in connection with this news release or related events contain or may contain “forward-looking statements” within the meaning of Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, and the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. In this context, forward-looking statements mean statements related to future events, which may impact our expected future business and financial performance, and often contain words such as “expects”, “anticipates”, “intends”, “plans”, “believes”, “potential”, “will”, “should”, “could”, “would”, “optimistic” or “may” and other words of similar meaning. These forward-looking statements are based on information available to us as of the date of this news release and represent management’s current views and assumptions. Forward-looking statements are not guarantees of future performance, events or results and involve significant known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other factors which may be beyond our control. Readers are cautioned not to place undue reliance on these forward-looking statements, which apply only as of the date of this news release. Potential investors should review Arrive AI’s Registration Statement for more complete information, including the risk factors that may affect future results, which are available for review at . Accordingly, forward-looking statements should not be relied upon as a predictor of actual results. We do not undertake to update our forward-looking statements to reflect events or circumstances that may arise after the date of this news release, except as required by law.
summary: Arrive AI, an autonomous delivery network anchored by patented AI-powered Arrive Points, will report its second quarter fiscal results on August 14, 2025. Following the news release, the company will host a conference call and webcast to review its results and strategic progress. The executives participating include CEO, Chairman and Founder Dan O’Toole, Chief Operating Officer Mark Hamm, Chief Strategy Officer Neerav Shah, Chief Financial Officer Todd Pepmeier and Corporate Counsel John Ritchison. The company's platform provides real-time tracking, smart logistics alerts and advanced chain of custody controls to support shippers, delivery services and autonomous networks. However, forward-looking statements are not necessarily accurate due to current circumstances.
shortSummary: Arrive AI will report its second quarter fiscal results on August 14, 2025, with executives discussing strategic progress and potential future developments.

scraped_sources.text:
Leveraging AI to automate and enhance the final step of delivery, bringing faster, smarter solutions to the logistics industry.
We deliver real-time optimization, cost efficiency, and security—giving businesses the tools to scale effortlessly, improve customer experience, and streamline logistics like never before.
Get deliveries on your time with 24/7 access at Arrive Point™. Skip business hour restrictions and ship anytime it works for you.
Grow your operations and handle more shipments without the hassle of added costs and manual effort.
Integrate with major couriers for secure and reliable deliveries. Choose the best carrier for your needs.
Drop off and pick up packages with controlled access at Arrive Point™ so only the right person retrieves them.
Store temperature-sensitive goods with climate-controlled storage.
Protect shipments with secure access control.
Automate logistics with AI for smart delivery efficiencies.
Ensure precise, contactless deliveries with drones and robots.
Track in real-time with optimized routes and operational insights.
Track and oversee transfers at every stage of the delivery process.
Arrive Point™ redefines business operations with AI-powered solutions tailored for your business needs.
Ensure timely and secure delivery of critical medical supplies while maintaining chain of custody.
Streamline supply chain operations, enabling businesses to optimize delivery times and reduce costs.

argos_summary: Arrive AI, an autonomous delivery network, will announce its second quarter fiscal results on August 14, 2025, followed by a conference call to discuss the outcomes and strategic plans. The company utilizes AI-powered Arrive Points™ to enhance last-mile delivery through real-time tracking and integration with smart home devices, aiming to streamline logistics and improve customer experience. Management will address quarterly achievements and future objectives during the call.
